Accelerate drug discovery and development with in silico solutions

Aganitha partners with global biopharma to accelerate research and development through in silico based bioinformatics solutions leveraging Cloud, Data, DevOps, Analytics and AI/ML.

Transforming biopharma R&D using computational sciences and AI

The biopharma industry is in the early stages of a dramatic transformation in how it operates, from drug discovery to clinical trials to clinical operations. We partner with biopharma companies to drive this transformation.

Our solutions enable biopharma R&D and IT to efficiently tackle the complexity, scale, and richness of modern R&D and clinical domains. They are built on the following enablers that deliver great outcomes and significantly enhance the pace of innovation.

Contextualized in silico models

Enable virtuous round-tripping between in silico and in vitro experiments by developing customer specific models blending advances in biology, chemistry, and computing.

High throughput automation

Provide quick insights by combining analytics, and AI with high throughput automation to reduce cycle times and drive efficiencies.

Data as an R&D Asset

Organize and enrich enterprise data in an easy to consume format helping scientists increase research productivity and achieve quicker strategic decision making.

High concentration biological design

Using in silico models to characterize high concentration samples to maximize the efficiency of screening, while minimizing the total amount of samples required for analysis.

Quantum chemical descriptors

Predict low yielding reactions and enable accurate predictions of activation energy with quantum chemical descriptors with machine learning while decreasing avoidable experiment expenditure.

R&D platform tools in a box

Setting up the in silico computing platform and artificial intelligence building blocks that complement the traditional lab-based approaches across drug research and development.

Learn more about our platforms, solutions and services

GET IN TOUCH

Why Aganitha?

Leverage our experience and strengths to build transformational solutions in biopharma.

Multi-domain skills

We have built a strong multi-domain team that combines their expertise in Biology, Chemistry, AI/ML, DevOps, and Cloud to build valuable solutions for our customers.

Deep focus

We are deeply invested in the biopharma industry continually developing solutions, frameworks, and building blocks across the drug research & development value chain.

Solutions foundation

Our reference architecture and computational platform enables us to build high quality solutions quickly, using DevOps for automating computing processes and leveraging cloud infrastructure for resource intensive computing.

Agile + enterprise-grade

Our leadership team is hands-on and brings the required variety of expertise, experience, and management: start-up + enterprise mindset, technology + domain skills, and small team incubation + large team scaling.

Client centric

We make it easy for clients to engage with us in different types of projects while ensuring that they retain the Intellectual Property Rights (IPR) and Molecule licenses.

Client teams - research + IT

We work well with leaders and practitioners in both research and IT divisions of biopharma companies while ensuring that role and department specific objectives are met with technology, domain, and management approaches.
